snippet.title: Nous Game Playthrough
snippet.description:
Nous is a game developed by a team of students from DigiPen Institute of Technology were you are stuck in a program called Nous with its AI. The AI's trying to teach you how to get through virtual life simulated problems and at the same your helping it learn how to better understand its purpose. Sadly the AI is a little psychotic, so things go to hell. Nous is a very interesting unique game and I definitely recommend checking this one out.  

Here is the link to download Nous http://www.whatisnous.com/

Here is a link to a video were Brett Cutler talks about the process of making Nous http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gjWB7Y531ds&feature=player_embedded
